    About Me

    I am a Ph.D. candidate at UC Berkeley advised by Prof. Xin Guo. My primary research interests include stochastic control and games, theoretical reinforcement learning and machine learning

    Education

    • Ph.D. Industrial Engineering & Operation Research, UC Berkeley (Berkeley, CA), 2020 - 2025 (Expected)
